amendment.description: To ensure continued United States support for the Government of Ukraine to stand firm against aggression by the Government of Russia in Europe.

vote.text: Amendment SA 299 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 76.

action.text: Amendment SA 299 proposed by Senator Reed.
